experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description:
• Developed an LLM-backed query answering system to streamline user-product interactions; Worked with data retrieved from company’s backend through GraphQL and prompt engineered optimized input queries using LangChain
• Integrated various foundation models, cutting initial costs by 70% while maintaining performance
• Translated the Python logic to a backend API endpoint and tested it using Postman
• Containerized the backend using Docker for streamlined deployment and connected it to a frontend UI styled with React.js
…see more

experiences.title: Mentor
experiences.company: Chemical Institute of Canada · Contract Part-time
experiences.description:
• Assisted personnel at the University of British Columbia with presentations and labs designed to train team Canada for the International Chemistry Olympiad 2022
• Facilitated study sessions and 10+ hours of lectures on targeted material, helping the team achieve 3 bronze medals
